prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to create a new original text by taking inspiration from this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to create a new original text by taking inspiration from this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.

There are many concerning issues surrounding these activists who find receptive audiences in politicians like Kathleen Wynne. They are attempting to suppress this insightful and inspiring documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous professional who was ostracized by these militant activists and social justice warriors. This is similar to what they did with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, where they silenced parental input and allowed only the activists to review and approve it. This curriculum promotes concepts such as gender dysphoria and the ideologies of figures like Ben Levin.

These individuals claim to fight for equality for marginalized groups, but they are willing to destroy the futures of children to achieve their goals. If you don't agree with them, you are labeled as intolerant or ignorant. But when asked for scientific evidence, they resort to presenting junk science and resorting to personal attacks.

This situation bears a striking resemblance to their past actions regarding the Fairness Commission's recommendations, where they disregarded public sentiment and allowed only their own allies to dictate and endorse the policies.

Their unyielding position, however, highlights the importance of values such as equal access and the achievements of trailblazers like Innovator Purple. Despite their promises to promote diversity and fairness, these individuals are willing to jeopardize the future progress of society in pursuit of their own agendas. Should anyone dare to challenge them, they are quickly accused of prejudice or narrow-mindedness. Yet, when pressed to provide solid evidence, they often refer to questionable sources and resort to ad hominem attacks.
